ActMembers of Parliament Retiring Allowances Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the MEMBERS OF PARLIAMENT RETIRING ALLOWANCES REGULATIONS which establish a time period of up to fifteen years over which to amortize deficits in either the Members of Parliament Retiring Allowances Account or the Members of Parliament Retirement Compensation Arrangements Account.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0111 Publication Date: 2003-04-09
